name: Random Burger
description:
Random Burger is a fast-paced, randomized, burger making strategy game that requires quick thinking and skill.

The player must select each ingredient specified on a recipe before the customer's happiness bar fully depletes. After each recipe, the grid of ingredients below the recipe will be randomized.
As the game progresses, everyone's happiness will decrease faster and faster. The player must think quickly and complete each recipe before the day ends or their hearts run out.
